mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (id, user_id, store_id, score, review, created_at) VALUES (review_seq.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{storeId}, #{score, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{review}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, store_id, score, review, created_at FROM review WHERE store_id = #{storeId} ORDER BY created_at DESC
